text: Lo! verily Unto Allah belongeth whatsoever is in the heavens and the earth) of created beings. (He knoweth your condition) whether it is disbelief or faith, trueness or denial, sincerity or hypocrisy, uprightness or crookedness, etc. (And (He knoweth) the Day when they are returned unto Him) unto Allah on the Day of Judgement (so that He may inform them of what they did) in this worldly life. (Allah is Knower of all things) concerning their works'.
